note:
She/Her. Lefty in hand and belief. Gassy and Working Class Sassy.

New here. Please bear with me as I work on figuring out how I want to use this platform.

I'm always reading something or exploring world music. I enjoy having a quiet life. I like to walk. I use public transportation and find myself growing increasingly anti-car these days. (I don't care if you have a car, I just choose not to have one. I get around fine and I'm OK.)

I refuse to tolerate classism, racism, and inequality.
